alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 27 at 1:51PM PDT until March 28 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...South/southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern San Joaquin Valley and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County Counties. * WHEN...8 PM PDT this evening to 5 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty southerly winds will develop Monday evening and persist into Tuesday. Strongest winds are expected Monday night through mid-day Tuesday, and in the northern Sacramento Valley and adjacent foothills.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern San Joaquin Valley
